creator: Plato (Πλάτων)
description:
LibriVox recording of Charmides by Plato (Πλάτων). (Translated by Benjamin Jowett.)
Read in English by Geoffrey Edwards
Charmides (Χαρμίδης) discusses the virtue of temperance. (Summary by Geoffrey Edwards)
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.

M4B Format Available
subject: librivox; audiobooks;philosophy; God; ethics; plato; virtue; temperance
title: Charmides
